option.name: originalContent
option.value:
ALTER TABLE files ADD COLUMN owner_local_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL AFTER owner_realm, ADD INDEX idx_files_owner_local_id (owner_local_id), ADD CONSTRAINT fk_files_owner_local_id FOREIGN KEY (owner_local_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;
UPDATE files f JOIN users u ON f.owner_id = u.keycloak_user_id SET f.owner_local_id = u.id WHERE f.owner_local_id IS NULL;

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
ALTER TABLE files ADD COLUMN owner_local_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NULL AFTER owner_realm, ADD INDEX idx_files_owner_local_id (owner_local_id), ADD CONSTRAINT fk_files_owner_local_id FOREIGN KEY (owner_local_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;
UPDATE files f JOIN users u ON f.owner_id = u.keycloak_user_id SET f.owner_local_id = u.id WHERE f.owner_local_id IS NULL;
